div.h2: We believe in the value of each scholar's story
div.p: Every student has a name, every name has a story, and we are connected to each of those stories. Here at Utica Academy of Science, we know deeply that education does not exist in the vacuum of a classroom. We have a remarkable team of educators across our buildings who are committed to providing your children the best opportunity to become productive, contributing and caring citizens. Take a moment to watch our most recent Dance video to see how much fun we have, or click on the link for our 2018-2019 Fact Sheet to learn how we follow through on our commitments.

a.title: Utica Academy of Science 2019 Fact Sheet
